Growth Solutions

Get the Traction Your Business Needs

Low cost, flexible integrated marketing programs geared toward reaching your unique business goals.

We’re not vendors, we're strategic partners.

We'll help you build, implement and sustain an integrated marketing and sales program for your company, we’ll learn how your business works and how your customers think. Our growth solution programs are custom-designed for growing businesses. These ongoing programs are built to serve as a core piece of your company’s business development strategy. The success of these programs require smart strategy, ongoing implementation, consistent data analysis and regular refinement. It also requires buy-in from the top of your organization and active collaboration with your internal business development teams.

We’re proud to say that the strong majority of our engagements have turned into long-term partnerships. Many of our clients have been working with us for many years.

"We've been working with FreshJones for over 10 years. We've grown from a small company in Vermont into a world-wide industry leader. Along the way we've been able to rely on FreshJones to help us visually communicate Chroma's vision, message and image to the scientific communities we serve. They adopt a deep understanding of our unique culture and challenges and they have the uncommon ability to conceptualize often difficult scientific concepts and translate them into easy-to-understand, eye-catching visuals."

—Chroma Technology Corp

What you get when you hire us.

We become an extension of your internal team – an outsourced marketing department there to strengthen and grow your business. Investing in a partnership with FreshJones is similar to investing in a new employee, but the variety of skills, capablities and experience we bring to the table is highly uncommon in a single person.

When you hire us, you’ll get a commited team of professional that includes a strategist, developer, designer and account manager who’s there to answer your calls and emails whenever you need to talk. Our team will commit to learning your business, and get to know your customers. You’ll be signing up for a results-driven partnership, aimed at creating a long-lasting, trust-based relationship.

If you think we might be a good fit, let’s have a conversation. If nothing else, we’ll make sure to point you in the right direction.

How will we fuel your growth?

  • 1

    Build Your Growth Strategy

    No two companies are alike, so we'll get to know you, your business and the challenges and problems you face. We'll listen to things you've tried so far, what's worked and what hasn't and where we can fit in and help. We'll put together a complete plan to meet your unique challenges and goals based on your specific business needs.

  • 2

    Ramp Up Your Digital Prescence

    Everything starts online. Customers are searching for and making decisions about your business based on information they find online. We'll make sure your digital footprint is accurate, on-brand, optimized and fully prepared be there and be helpful when customers and prospects go looking.

  • 3

    Attract and Drive Leads to Your Door

    A great website isn't much if no one knows about it. Here's where we'll put your growth strategy into practice, whether through lead-generating content on your website, call-only campaigns or whatever's necessary, we have the in-house capabilities to get your business moving towards your specific goals.

  • 4

    Monitor, Test and Improve

    You wouldn't expect a seed to grow without watching it and giving it what it needs to thrive. The same goes with your business. That's why we'll work together to look at what the data is telling us, we'll optimize, test, adjust and improve your marketing machine as it continues to building momentum.

Sound good? Learn more

Get a better return on your investment

We believe that in order to produce the results you need, marketing and sales programs need to be consistently fed, tracked, measured, optimized and improved upon. Consistent deployment of marketing activities, combined with monthly and quarterly analysis help us learn what's producing results, what isn't and where we can pivot, improve and optimize along the way.

In our experience, investing in long-term marketing and sales programs as opposed to working project-by-project yields much higher return on investment, your cost of aquisition is lower and the focus on the big picture rather than localized efforts, plus the process of building and working as a team forms great partnerships and lasting relationships.

Solutions By Industry

We have a broad range of experience creating advertising and marketing solutions for a variety of industries and markets.

Manufacturing

Have a manufacturing business? We've got experience helping companies like yours. Focusing on trustworthiness and authority, quality and reliability, performance, data-driven lead and prospect generation

Learn More

Higher Education

Focusing on increasing enrollment and retention, degrees and programs, fundraising initiatives, student, parent, faculty and alumni engagement, promoting and showcasing campus and college experience.

Non-Profit

Focusing on user-experience, donation and fund-raising tools, strong donor and support relationships, increased memberships, greater awareness and community involvement in your cause.

Learn More

Financial Services

Retail & Distribution

Lets Schedule a Call

Let's get to know each other.

We'll ask you some questions and listen to your specific challenges. We'll find out what you've tried so far, what's worked for you in the past and what hasn't and lastly we'll let you know how we might be able to help and see if you'd like to take a next step.

Would that be worth a 1/2 hour of your time?
